name: commandbase
description: Personal Claude Code workflow tools — skills, agents, and hooks for the RPI workflow

plugins.name: commandbase-core
plugins.description: Shared documentation agents and standalone utility skills. Install this first — other commandbase plugins depend on its agents.

plugins.name: commandbase-code
plugins.description: Code BRDSPI workflow — brainstorm, research, design, structure, plan, implement for software projects. Requires commandbase-core.

plugins.name: commandbase-vault
plugins.description: Vault BRDSPI workflow plus daily operations for Obsidian vault management. Requires commandbase-core.

plugins.name: commandbase-services
plugins.description: Services BRDSPI workflow for homelab Docker infrastructure. Requires commandbase-core.

plugins.name: commandbase-research
plugins.description: Web, framework, and repo research with sourced documentation output, plus cross-document analysis. Requires commandbase-core.

plugins.name: commandbase-git-workflow
plugins.description: Opinionated git commit workflow with security review and docs staleness detection. Requires commandbase-core.

plugins.name: commandbase-session
plugins.description: Worktree isolation, context handoff, and pattern extraction. Requires commandbase-core.

plugins.name: commandbase-meta
plugins.description: Skill, agent, and hook authoring tools for building Claude Code extensions.
